meta.content: If you need this document translated, please call your child’s school principal - Si necesita este documento traducido, por favor comuníquese con la escuela de su hijo - Se você precisa este documento traduzido, entre em contato com a escola do ses filho - Si vous avez besoin de traduire ce document, s'il vous plaît contacter l'école de votre enfant

meta.script: function waitForTranslateToDisplay(selector, time) { if(document.querySelector(selector)!=null) { var translate = document.getElementsByClassName("goog-te-combo")[0]; translate.setAttribute("aria-label", "Select language for translation");} else {setTimeout(function() { waitForTranslateToDisplay(selector, time);}, time);}}

header.h1: Bedford Public Schools Coronavirus - COVID 19 Update - April 21, 2020 (Bedford Public Schools will be CLOSED for the remainder of the 2019-2020 School Year)

span.content: Bedford Public Schools Coronavirus - COVID 19 Update - April 21, 2020 (Bedford Public Schools will be CLOSED for the remainder of the 2019-2020 School Year)

div.p: If you need this document translated, please call your child’s school principal - Si necesita este documento traducido, por favor comuníquese con la escuela de su hijo - Se você precisa este documento traduzido, entre em contato com a escola do ses filho - Si vous avez besoin de traduire ce document, s'il vous plaît contacter l'école de votre enfant - 如果你需要这份文件翻译，请联系您的孩子的学校 - ،إذا كنت تحتاج /تحتاجين إلى ترجمة هذه الوثيقة إلى اللغة العربية يرجى الاتصال بمدرسة طفلك/طفلتك

u.a: Bedford Public Schools Coronavirus - COVID-19 Update for April 21, 2020

strong.u: Town of Bedford/Bedford Public Schools CORONAVIRUS - COVID 19 PAST UPDATES -

p.strong: Please click the dates for past updates
